articles.description: Founded in January 2022, Bengaluru-based fintech startup Gullak operates a savings and investment app that enables users to save small amounts regularly and automatically invests them in digital gold.
articles.content: Gullak.Money, a Bengaluru-based saving and investment app, raised $1.3 million in its pre-seed round from Better Capital and Stellaris Ventures Partners. The startup will deploy the capital for growt… [+5277 chars]

articles.title: Dogecoin Investor Sues Elon Musk For $258 Billion Over Crypto Support - NDTV
articles.description: An investor in dogecoin, originally created as a joke but whose value increased and fell as it was promoted by Elon Musk, filed a $258 billion lawsuit Thursday against the billionaire and his companies Tesla and SpaceX.
articles.content:
Dogecoin investor asked Musk to pay double that in damages -- an additional $172 billion.

articles.title: Blue collar job openings rise the most in 18 months - Economic Times
articles.description: Economists and job market experts are of the view that the recent rise in the number of Covid-19 infections in the country and fears of a possible fourth wave is not likely to deter companies strengthening their teams in the near-term amid pickup in business …
